alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 05 at 3:11PM HST until February 06 at 12:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY FOR MAUNA KEA AND MAUNA LOA SUMMITS... .Moisture moving in from the east and southeast will extend to the summits overnight, where temperatures will be below freezing. While some snow is possible, freezing rain may bring the primary hazard. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON HST MONDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain and snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. * WHERE...Big Island Summits. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to noon HST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible as summit roadways may become icy. Visibility will be significantly reduced at times.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet, or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Be prepared for slippery roads and limited visibilities and use caution while driving.
